[天网管理系统](http://www.shiyanbar.com/ctf/1810)


```php
$str="QNKCDZO";
$str_md5=md5($str);
if($str_md5=='0')
    echo "flag_is_md5_0e", "\n";
```

弱类型比较
```php
$flag="flag_is_bool";
$data = array(
    "user"=>true,
    "pass"=>true
);

 if($data['user'] == '???' && $data['pass']=='???')
 {
   echo $flag, "\n";
 }
```
